termsOfService.title: Yogiface â€“ Terms of Service
termsOfService.principle: Yogiface is a wellness application that provides face yoga exercises and guided content aimed at supporting facial muscles. The Application does not provide medical, clinical, aesthetic, or professional health services.
termsOfService.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") contain the rules applicable to your use of the Yogiface mobile application ("Application"). By using the Application, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree to the Terms, you should not use the Application.

section1.title: 1. Scope of Service
section1.content: Yogiface offers users a guided face yoga and exercise experience. The Application includes:
items: Face yoga and exercise guides
Daily and weekly exercise routines
Targeted recommendations for specific facial areas
Customizable plans and progress tracking
section1.note: The content provided does not constitute professional, medical, or aesthetic advice, diagnosis, or treatment.

section2.title: 2. Conditions of Use
items: You must be at least 13 years old.
You must provide accurate and up-to-date account information.
You acknowledge that the exercises are not a medical service.

section3.title: 3. Prohibited Uses
items: Using the app for illegal activities.
Selling, reproducing, or distributing content without permission.
Unauthorized access, hacking, or reverse engineering attempts.

section4.title: 4. Account and Membership
section4.content: You are responsible for your account security. Yogiface reserves the right to suspend or close accounts in case of usage contrary to the Terms.

section5.title: 5. Premium and Paid Services
items: Pricing is based on App Store and Google Play policies.
Subscriptions may renew automatically; cancellations are made via store settings.

section6.title: 6. Disclaimer
section6.content: Users perform exercises at their own responsibility. In case of any health issues, users should consult a healthcare professional. The App should not be used for diagnosis or treatment.

section7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
section7.content: Design, software, images, and exercise content belong to Yogiface. Unauthorized copying or source code modification is prohibited.

section12.title: 12. Governing Law
section12.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Turkey. Istanbul Central Courts have jurisdiction over disputes.

cookiesPolicy.title: Yogiface â€“ Cookie Policy
cookiesPolicy.intro: Welcome to Yogiface! Every time you visit the app, we use digital helpers (cookies) to improve and personalize your experience. This policy explains how you can manage your preferences.

section1.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
section1.content: Cookies are small data files placed on your device. They help us understand how you use the app and make your experience smoother. Cookies do not directly contain your identity; they act as digital helpers that remember your preferences and usage habits.

essential.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies
essential.content: Required for basic app functions. They support core processes such as session management, security, and basic navigation.

performance.title: Performance and Analytics Cookies
performance.content: Helps us understand which areas are used most frequently and which sections need improvement.

personalization.title: Personalization Cookies
personalization.content: Provides a more personal experience by remembering settings such as language, theme, and exercise preferences.

marketing.title: Marketing and Advertising Cookies
marketing.content: May be used to provide content and promotions more suitable to your interests and sometimes works with third-party services.

section3.title: 3. Why Do We Use Cookies?
items: To ensure the app runs fast and smoothly
To reduce repetitive actions by remembering user preferences
To make the experience more personal and useful
To improve the app by analyzing usage data

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
section4.content: Some cookies may be placed by third-party partners providing analytical and advertising services. These are subject to the providers' own privacy and cookie policies.

section5.title: 5. Cookie Control and Management
section5.content: You can manage cookies via device settings, app permissions, or system settings. Disabling necessary cookies may cause parts of the app to malfunction.

section6.title: 6. Use of Data
section6.content: Data obtained through cookies, if qualified as personal data, is processed within the legal framework under the Privacy Policy.

section7.title: 7. Policy Updates
section7.content: This policy may be updated depending on technological and legal changes. The current version becomes effective as soon as it is published.

privacyPolicy.title: Yogiface â€“ Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains the principles regarding the collection, use, storage, and protection of personal data of all users who use the Yogiface mobile application ("App"). By using the App, you accept this policy.
privacyPolicy.principle: Yogiface adopts user privacy and data security as a core principle. All personal data is processed in accordance with GDPR and relevant legislation.

sub1.title: 1.1. User-Provided Data
items: Name, nickname, or profile info
Email address (for registration, purchase, and support)
Exercise plans, preferences, and personalization settings
Feedback, requests, and support messages

sub2.title: 1.2. Automatically Collected Data
items: Device type, operating system, and technical info
Approximate location data (city/country level)
Usage info such as session duration and screen interactions
Performance, error, and crash logs

section2.title: 2. Data Usage Purposes
items: To ensure uninterrupted operation of the app
To personalize and optimize the face yoga experience
To perform error detection and performance analysis
To respond to user demands and support requests
section2.note: Important: User data is never sold to third parties.

section3.title: 3. Data Retention
items: Data is stored as long as the user account is active.
When an account is deleted, personal data is irreversibly removed.
Support records are kept for a maximum of 12 months after completion.

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.content: Your data is only shared in case of legal requirements (official requests), service providers (cloud infrastructure, analytics), or with explicit user consent.

section5.title: 5. Cookies and Security
section5.content: Yogiface may use cookies for performance and experience enhancement. Your data is protected by SSL/TLS encryption and regular security audits.

section6.title: 6. User Rights
section6.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete, and restrict data processing.

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
section8.content: Yogiface is not intended for individuals under 13. Any data collected from this age group will be deleted immediately if detected.

q1.question: What is YogiFace?
q1.answer: YogiFace is an AI-powered personal care app that offers face yoga exercises to improve skin appearance by working facial muscles.

q2.question: Does the app really work?
q2.answer: Yes. Face yoga activates facial muscles to increase skin firmness, accelerate circulation, and provide a more youthful appearance with regular use.

q3.question: What does artificial intelligence do here?
q3.answer: YogiFace analyzes facial features, identifies target areas, and creates a personalized exercise plan. This way, each movement is optimized according to personal needs.

q4.question: How much time do I need to dedicate each day?
q4.answer: Only 5-10 minutes a day is sufficient. With regular practice, visible changes begin within a few weeks.

q5.question: When will I see results?
q5.answer: With regular use, improvement in skin tone is visible within 2-3 weeks, and facial features become more defined within 4-6 weeks. Results may vary from person to person.

q6.question: Does it work for problems like double chin or sagging?
q6.answer: Yes. YogiFace offers targeted exercises for the jawline, cheek muscles, and neck area. When done regularly, these exercises provide significant tightening in these areas.

q7.question: How do I know if I'm doing the movements correctly?
q7.answer: The app uses AI to analyze your facial angle, expression, and movement pattern; it notifies you of any incorrect points.

q8.question: Is it suitable for all ages?
q8.answer: Yes. Face yoga is a non-invasive natural method. Everyone from a young age can safely practice it.

q9.question: Is YogiFace free?
q9.answer: Basic exercises are free. Personal programs, advanced face analysis, and special AI recommendations are included in the premium package.

q10.question: Can people who have had cosmetic surgery use it?
q10.answer: Many users use it safely, but it is recommended to consult a doctor during the post-operative recovery period.

screen1.title: Shape Your Face Naturally
screen1.description: Work your facial muscles with just a few minutes of daily face exercises. Create a natural, aesthetic, and non-invasive beauty routine.

screen2.title: Personalized Exercise Plan with Ai
screen2.description: AI analyzes your facial features, determines your needs, and recommends exercises tailored to you. It tracks which muscles need more work.

screen3.title: Visible Results
screen3.description: With regular use, facial contours become more defined, circulation improves, and skin appears more vibrant. Small steps every day bring big changes.

foreheadSmoother.description: This move releases tension in the forehead muscles and frown lines accumulated...

vMove.description: Strengthens the delicate skin around the eyes, lifts drooping eyelids, and erases signs of fatigue.

cheekLifter.title: The Cheek Lifter
cheekLifter.description: Lifts the cheek muscles (Zygomaticus) which are most prone to gravity, restoring the facial oval.

naturalIroning.title: Natural Ironing:
naturalIroning.description: Opens horizontal lines on the forehead and prevents them from deepening.

botoxEffect.title: Botox Effect
botoxEffect.description: Relaxes tense muscles and breaks the habit of frowning.

stressRelief.title: Stress Relief
stressRelief.description: Relieves stress accumulated on the forehead and alleviates headaches.

radiantAppearance.title: Radiant Appearance
radiantAppearance.description: Boosts blood circulation to give the skin a glow.

dePuffing.title: De-Puffing
dePuffing.description: Reduces facial puffiness through its lymphatic drainage effect.
